about_the_game:
What is Tivick'ing! Chronicles -Another Story-?

Tivick'ing! Chronicles -Another Story- is an expansion to Tivick'ing! Chronicles featuring an alternate game mode "Quest B" in the main game, and a brand-new story "Brant's Adventure". Delve deeper into the Tivick'ing world with this exciting new expansion! Content will be released as follows:

Release Date: November 2024

Requirement: [Demon Slayer] Achievement

Replay through the story again, but with some new challenges. In this alternate game mode some party members join later in the story, bosses have new behaviours, item locations have been moved, and certain items that were originally optional are now mandatory to complete the game. Are you up for the challenge?

Release Date: Early 2025

Requirement: [Tale of Brant] Achievement

After returning to his home continent of Suukonia, Brant soon finds himself sucked into another adventure. Play as Brant as he works to unravel the mystery behind the Wind Dragon, and this strange group of grave robbers after the dragons body parts... Encounter characters both old and new, and enjoy a different gameplay experience featuring several new field commands, character attacks, and collectibles.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 (32-bit/64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Graphics: 1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution
  • Storage: 71.5 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
